newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Russian kills three family members after row.
newsitem.headline: Russian kills three family members after row.

text.p: A Russian man tied up, tortured and beat to death three family members and repeatedly raped his 13-year-old sister-in-law after a quarrel, a Moscow police spokesman said on Monday.
He said the killer, a 27-year-old driver, was arrested late on Sunday after the 13-year-old escaped her four-day ordeal in which he ran amok with a metal pipe and a kitchen knife.
The murderer had clubbed to death his parents-in-law, who were in their 40s, and his wife's 63-year-old grandmother.

He also stabbed his 23-year-old wife 10 times and she is now critically ill in hospital. The victims were found at his apartment with parts of a metal pipe and a bloody kitchen knife nearby, the spokesman said.
The sister-in-law managed to escape when the killer left the apartment after the murders. She had been raped in the victims' presence, the spokesman said.

Criminal investigators said the murderer had no history of mental illness and did not have a criminal record. They said he had tied up his victims after a quarrel with his wife in which her relatives had sided against him.
